column5: I have seen it mentioned from time to time OFC hats. Do you have to attend a function to get one?   Maybe I will have to take a drive over to meet TJ and see if he has an extra one kicking around...... By the way, who was the 1000th member?
Here is the OFC online store...  OFC Apparel  Hope this helps.
Well I just did some searching, and it looks like Frank81 was the 1000th member.  Wooohoooo, I think he should get a free hat  Joey
Ha Ha... Thanks Joey. By the way..I have seen fisherpeople wearing those hats before..somewhere? Maybe at Wades Landing. Maybe at our shop. Will definitely pay attention next time I see one.
I'm sure he meant to thank you to Corey.
Good Ol' Frank81, I always say.  And Good Ol' Corey,  too.  I always say that as well.
